options.name: One Purpose
options.description: Orcish culture is one of loyalty and perserverance to a greater cause. Gain +1 Resilience and +1 Initiative.

options.name: Faithless
options.description: The Orcish cultures have long since given up worshipping the Gods and insulate themselves from the temptations they offer. Gain +3 Dark and +3 Divine Mitigation.

options.name: The Old Ways
options.description: The Orcish culture still has small remnants of those who have dedicated themselves to shamanism. Gain 3 Beginner and 3 Novice Druidic Spells.

options.name: Body and Mind
options.description: Orcish culture values a diverse eduction so that all who share in their lifestyle can find the correct path. Gain +1 Athletics and +1 Academics.

options.name: Trained by the Thok-Ro
options.description: You have training with the Thok-Ro Warriors. Gain +1 Block with Shields and +1 Damage with Slashing Weapons.

options.name: Craft : Refining
options.description: The Orcish culture cherishes perfection and perfect metalwork. Once per executing a Recipe that requires an Ingot and before you attempt your Crafting Check, your next Check counts as an Overcraft on a Dice Roll of 9 or higher.

options.name: Orcish Industry
options.description: The Orcish culture believes in cross-trained artisans to secure their future. Gain +1 Smithing, +1 Ammocraft, +1 Alchemy and +1 Engineering.
